summary:
USER_CONTEXT: Fix RestructuredText (RST) output format in astropy tables to support `header_rows` parameter, which currently raises TypeError but works with other formats like `ascii.fixed_width`

TASK_TRACKING: 
COMPLETED: 
- Problem analysis completed - identified RST writer doesn't accept header_rows parameter
- Located relevant files: /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy/astropy/io/ascii/rst.py and test files
- Examined RST class structure inheriting from FixedWidth
- Found FixedWidth class supports header_rows parameter in __init__
- Identified extra_writer_pars tuple in core.py that may need header_rows added

PENDING: 
- Create working reproduction script (current attempts blocked by astropy build issues)
- Implement fix to add header_rows support to RST class
- Add tests for RST header_rows functionality
- Verify fix works correctly

CURRENT_STATE: 
- Working directory: /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy
- Unable to import astropy modules due to missing compiled extensions
- Need alternative approach to test without full build

CODE_STATE: 
- RST class in /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy/astropy/io/ascii/rst.py inherits from FixedWidth
- FixedWidth class supports header_rows in __init__ method
- extra_writer_pars tuple in core.py lists supported writer parameters
- Test files located at /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy/astropy/io/ascii/tests/test_rst.py

TESTS: 
- Build errors preventing direct astropy import testing
- Need to create alternative test approach

CHANGES: None yet

DEPS: 
- astropy.io.ascii modules
- FixedWidth base classes
- Core writer parameter handling
